page.title: 01THE GENERAL AREA
page.content: Our general area consists mainly of three categories{1.Agriculture {2.Housing 3.Woodland . 1.Agriculture _ Cereal crops mainly with some rough grazing and other vegetables.Soft fruit area in general decline.2.Housing _ Pencaitland village consists of a mixture of council and private housing.Future developments are planned.Small holdings are used mainly as housing. 3.Woodland _ Areas of natural woodland are mainly deciduous.Narrow strips of conifers have been planted as wind _ breaks.The River Tyne flows from west to east creating a valley through the middle of our area.
